text:
Hi folks! I'm trying to get started with `BinaryBuilder.jl` to cross-compile binaries from a Mac. I'm hitting some unexpected behavior about DirectorySource vs. ArchiveSource copy behavior and the use of bsdtar (vs. gnutar) on macOS.

Is there a specific channel I should direct these questions to?

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>

Success, it has been cross posted <https://discourse.julialang.org/t/56710| to Discourse>. Keep and eye out on Discourse for responses and please add an answer there once you are satisfied with the solution so others can benefit as well. Happy debugging!
<#C674ELDNX|binarybuilder> is a good place to ask, and is fairly active
